title: Partial Streamer Skirt
description: love apron, Kueichow province; white belt with red ties; attached are eight cross stitched 2-3/4\" x 3-1/2\" squares in red, black and white; all beads missing except one on far right, 3\" long including tassel
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
